channel.title: [Delta] Praesentia
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/21buro9.png[/img] Base: [b]My Optimized Delta 1.5[/b] I wanted to start a project as a side-project because It's vacation, and I don't want to be that rusty in programming when I return to school. [b]Why choose Delta?[/b]: I wanted to choose Delta because it's the base I'm most familiar with, and there aren't any tutorials, so I won't be tempted to look at any copy & paste tutorials. [b]Information[/b]: This server will mimic a 420-474-protocol. (still writing info) [b]First things first[/b]: [ul][li]Removal of thread-per-client[/li] [li]Re-Enable RSA & ISAAC Encryption[/li] [li]Handle the packet system through arrays[/li] [li]Handle NPC/Item systems alternatively instead of in a config file[/li][/ul] [b]Features will not be listed to the public, it will only be shown.[/b] [b]Features will not be listed to the public, it will only be shown.[/b] [b]Features will not be listed to the public, it will only be shown.[/b] [size=14pt]Media[/size] Range used to hit the npc when the user was still drawing back their arrow: [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/54vukl.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/15g4juo.gif[/img]
[b]Updates - 7/28/11[/b] -Rewriting range (almost complete) -Started working on various weapon specials -Started magic -Reduced client process [b]7/23/11[/b] [ul][li]Started the functions for the lunar[/li] [li]Added some weapons (anims and specials)[/li] [li]Removed Delta's old npc methods (process for npc hits)[/li][/ul] [b]Updates: 7/23/2011[/b] [ul][li]Finished rewriting Range and calculations[/li] [li]Finished rewriting Prayer[/li] [li]Finished adding player emotes and skillcapes[/li] [li]Started working on magic[/li][/ul]
[size=18pt]The Team[/size] [b]Programmers[/b]: -Kingdomkey01 - - [b]Webmaster(s)[/b]: - [b]Alpha/Beta testers[/b]: -DeathSlay - - - Want to join the team? Current positions: Programmer, Alpha/Beta Tester, Webmaster, Application [code] Position: MSN/EMAIL: Years in RSPS/Java: Why you want to join: Some previous work: [/code] I may not do alpha testing until I can create a webclient.[/center]

item.title: [Delta] Praesentia
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

Position: Webmaster
MSN/EMAIL: alex.amayzing@hotmail.com
Years in RSPS/Java: I’ve been playing / managing Runescape private servers for several years now, probably close to four.
Why you want to join: I just recently took interest in Runescape private servers again and I’d like to help manage one.
Some previous work:

http://forumsource.org

^ My current website and ongoing project.

Oh and to elaborate on what I know. I’m fluent with HTML and CSS and I know bits and pieces of PHP, it’s still an ongoing learning process of mine. I’ve worked with almost every single forum software online at the moment, with the exception of small, unpopular ones such as Vanilla Forums, punBB, etc… I’ve also never worked with XenForo yet, unfortunately. Though, MyBB, IPB, vBulletin, phpBB, SMF, you name it, I’ve worked with it and have managed it well enough to do it again.

If you have any questions, please ask.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Praesentia
item.dc:creator: @kingdomkey01 kingdomkey01
item.description:
@kingdomkey01 wrote:

[quote=“DeathSlay, post:10, topic:405985”]Position: beta tester, can code little stuff.
MSN/EMAIL: deathslay317@hotmail.com
Years in RSPS/Java: um 2 or so? i quit for while tho
Why you want to join: im bored and im sick of 317s with 508s+ stuff
Some previous work: my own server i can send u link for later[/quote]
Accepted :).

Sorry about the lack of updates in the past days, I’ve been focusing on the new range system, playing around with graphics and timers. Calculations are almost complete for ranging.

Updates - 7/28/11
-Rewriting range (almost complete)
-Started working on various weapon specials
-Started magic
-Reduced client process

item.dc:creator: @kingdomkey01 kingdomkey01
item.description:
@kingdomkey01 wrote:

I started to take advantage of the 474 data in galkon’s client, I’ve started some key things before I go indepth into the features of the server.

UPDATE:

7/23/11

[ul][li]Started the functions for the lunar spellbook[/li]
[li]Added some weapons (anims and specials)[/li]
[li]Removed Delta’s old npc methods (process for npc hits)[/li][/ul]

Here’s a quick example of the lunar, I know it’s not much, but it’s an example of the 474 data.

item.title: [Delta] Praesentia
item.dc:creator: @kingdomkey01 kingdomkey01
item.description:
@kingdomkey01 wrote:

[center]

Base: My Optimized Delta 1.5

I wanted to start a project as a side-project because It’s vacation, and I don’t want to be that rusty in programming when I return to school.

Why choose Delta?:
I wanted to choose Delta because it’s the base I’m most familiar with, and there aren’t any tutorials, so I won’t be tempted to look at any copy & paste tutorials.

Information:
This server will mimic a 420-474-protocol. (still writing info)

First things first:

[ul][li]Removal of thread-per-client[/li]
[li]Re-Enable RSA & ISAAC Encryption[/li]
[li]Handle the packet system through arrays[/li]
[li]Handle NPC/Item systems alternatively instead of in a config file[/li][/ul]

Features will not be listed to the public, it will only be shown.
Features will not be listed to the public, it will only be shown.
Features will not be listed to the public, it will only be shown.

[size=14pt]Media[/size]
Range used to hit the npc when the user was still drawing back their arrow:

[b]Updates - 7/28/11[/b] -Rewriting range (almost complete) -Started working on various weapon specials -Started magic -Reduced client process

7/23/11

[ul][li]Started the functions for the lunar[/li]
[li]Added some weapons (anims and specials)[/li]
[li]Removed Delta’s old npc methods (process for npc hits)[/li][/ul]

Updates: 7/23/2011

[ul][li]Finished rewriting Range and calculations[/li]
[li]Finished rewriting Prayer[/li]
[li]Finished adding player emotes and skillcapes[/li]
[li]Started working on magic[/li][/ul]

[size=18pt]The Team[/size]

Programmers:
-Kingdomkey01

Webmaster(s):

Alpha/Beta testers:
-DeathSlay

Want to join the team?

Current positions: Programmer, Alpha/Beta Tester, Webmaster,

Application

Position:
MSN/EMAIL:
Years in RSPS/Java:
Why you want to join:
Some previous work:

I may not do alpha testing until I can create a webclient.[/center]

Read full topic
